name: Robotic Invasion Hotline
description:
This is an audio game which should be played with the custom Gregan Rotary Dial Telephone (TM) 2000. Unfortunately there's only one of these in existence (which we built at the SparksJam). Luckily, you can play the game anyway using keyboard controls.

Pickup phone: Up arrow key
Dial a number: Keys 0..9

The phone controller was made from an old 1979 rotary dial telephone hacked together with a Makey Makey, some wires and a roll of Xmas sellotape. The code is included as a .unitypackage if you want to have a go at hacking something similar together yourself.

Enjoy!
